episodes.title: THE UGANDAN CULT THAT Couldn't Stop Killing for religious reasons: The Full Documentary | 700 deaths
episodes.description:
Documentary about the Ugandan "Movement for the Restoration of the Ten Commandments of God". Exactly 20 years ago, in south-western Uganda's Kanungu district, they were locked inside a church, with the doors and windows nailed shut from the outside. It was then set alight.
Two decades on, the horror of the event is still too much for Ms Ariho, who appears to only be able to cope with the trauma by closing herself off from the emotion.
